messages.subject: Re: Award Notification .Final Notice.
messages.body:
CO/Cordoba No 21 Planta 2-A
28204 Madrid-Spain.
TEL/FAX:+3463502878
From_the desk of the Vice President
Internatioanl Promotions /Price Award Dept.
REF NO: EGS/2551256003/02
BATCH NO: 14/0017/IPD

Attn:Stick Winner.
Re: Award Notification .Final Notice.

We are pleased to inform you, that as a result of our RECENT LOTTERY DRAWS HELD on the 31st of January 2005.Your e-mail address attached to ticket number:11 23 34 38 48 49 46 750 with serial number:2113 ? 05 drew lucky numbers:13 15 ? 22 ? 37 39 which consequently won in the 2nd category. You have therefore been approved for a lump sum pay of US$715,810.00 (SEVEN HUNDRED AND FIFTEEN THOUSAND, EIGHT HUNDRED AND TEN US DOLLARS ONLY) Note:That All participants in this lottery program have been selected randomly through a computer ballot system drawn from over 20,000 companies and 30,000,000 individual email addresses from all search engines and web sites.This promotional program takes place every year,and is promoted and sponsored by eminent personalities like the Sultan of Brunei,Bill Gates of microsoft inc and other corporate organisations.This is to encourage the use of the internet and computers worldwide.

For security purpose and clarity,we advise that you keep your winning information confidential until your claims have been processed and your money remitted to you.This is part of our security protocol to avoid double claims and unwarranted abuse of this program by some participants.We look forward to your active participation in our next 4 million euro's slot. You are requested to contact your clearance/cliam Legal Practitioner (Lawyer) Barrister.John Natalia Eurocity chambers & Associate. He his your Attorney in respect to your Award winning contact him with this Email: barristerjohn_natalia@pluno.com for processing and remittance of your prize money to a designated account of your choice All winnings must be claimed not later than one month After the date of this notice. Please note,in order to avoid unnecessary delays and complications,remember to quote your reference number and batch numbers in all correspondence. Furthermore,should there be any change of address do inform Your Lawyer as soon as possible. Congratulations!!!once more and thank you for being part of our promotional program.

Sincerely,
MRS. SANDRA BLANCO.
VICE PRESIDENT.
INTL LOTERIA PRIMITIVA.

messages.body:
Cc: barristerjohn_natalia@pluno.com



Dear Sir,

This is astounding news.  I have calculated the odds
of winning to be 1:172,567,456 with a standard
deviation of 37,456,456 using a poisson distribution
with a alpha  of 72,309,394.  I am pinching myself, I
think.

Ted Kozinski
messages.raw:
TED KOZINSKI

Date: Thu, 21 Jul 2005

Ted Kozinski

messages.body:
Dear Ted Kozinski,
 
 Thanks for the mail ,It was recieved and it's
 content was well understood by me.
 As a matter of fact i will like you to know that the
 Certificate that you are requesting for is not
 within my reach for now.
 
 But i assure you that i will be able to get it.As i
 know the Certificate is presently in Spain ,where
 the Elgordo Lotteria was Drawn and Played.
 
 For the main time we not been able to forward the
 Certificate to CBC banking Coperation will
 definately disqualify you from claiming the Winning
 as a result that the Certificate is a kinda of
 evidence from the Elgordo Lotteria Company .So we
 not been capable of providing it will lead to the
 termination of the Claim ,But i as your Attorney/
 Representative in charge of this claim will see to
 it that you will get your claim.
 
 I made enquiries immediately i got your mail and i
 got to find out that i will have to go to spain to
 get the Original Copy of this Document and have it
 scanned and sent to CBC Banking Corperation.
 
 For me to be able to fly to Spain i will have to fly
 by AIR and you will have to take 
 responsibility for the Air Ticket and my Local and
 International while geting the Certificate in Spain
 .The amount for everything (AIR TICKET AND EXPENSES)
 is US$1250.
 
 Meanwhile you will also have to pay me my
 consultation fee before i will have to make any more
 effort to the remitting of your Money.And my
 consultation fee is only US$750.
 
 So the total amount required for this is
 US$2000.With all due respect i will like you to make
 the payment Via Western Union with the payment
 information below.
 
 First Name:  Ernest
 Last  Name:  Adam
 State:       Berlin
 Country:     Germany.
 
 Note: You are to make this payment within the next
 48Hrs so that i will leave immediately for spain.
 Get back to with the MTCN Number ,Senders State and
 Country ,Senders Full Name.I am sure that CBC
 Banking Corperation will be awaiting our urgent
 response .
 
 Any more Information do not hesitate to ask.
 Your's Cordialy,
 Barrister.John Natalia.
messages.raw:
BARRISTER JOHN NATALIA

Dear Ted Kozinski,

Thanks for the mail ,It was recieved and it's content was well understood by me. As a matter of fact i will like you to know that the Certificate that you are requesting for is not within my reach for now.

But i assure you that i will be able to get it.As i know the Certificate is presently in Spain ,where the Elgordo Lotteria was Drawn and Played.

For the main time we not been able to forward the Certificate to CBC banking Coperation will definately disqualify you from claiming the Winning as a result that the Certificate is a kinda of evidence from the Elgordo Lotteria Company .So we not been capable of providing it will lead to the termination of the Claim ,But i as your Attorney/ Representative in charge of this claim will see to it that you will get your claim.

I made enquiries immediately i got your mail and i got to find out that i will have to go to spain to get the Original Copy of this Document and have it scanned and sent to CBC Banking Corperation.

For me to be able to fly to Spain i will have to fly by AIR and you will have to take responsibility for the Air Ticket and my Local and International while geting the Certificate in Spain .The amount for everything (AIR TICKET AND EXPENSES) is US$1250.

Meanwhile you will also have to pay me my consultation fee before i will have to make any more effort to the remitting of your Money.And my consultation fee is only US$750.

So the total amount required for this is US$2000.With all due respect i will like you to make the payment Via Western Union with the payment information below.

First Name: Ernest
Last Name: Adam
State: Berlin
Country: Germany.

Note: You are to make this payment within the next 48Hrs so that i will leave immediately for spain. Get back to with the MTCN Number ,Senders State and Country ,Senders Full Name.I am sure that CBC Banking Corperation will be awaiting our urgent response .

Any more Information do not hesitate to ask.
Your's Cordialy,
Barrister.John Natalia.

messages.body:
$2000 for a piece of paper? maybe I should send the
mugu on a carnival cruise too





Cc: info@cbcbankcorp.org


Dear Sir,

Alright then, I will compromise with you.  I shall
call the airline directly and purchase the plane
ticket for you. In return you shall lay out the money
for the certificate.  For undertaking this risk I
shall offer you $10,000 of my prize winnings.  This is
to ensure that this is a legitimate matter.  I will
not hand over $2,000 in advance to a total stranger. 
If you do not accept I shall find someone else to
manage this affair.

Ted Kozinski
messages.raw:
$2000 for a piece of paper? maybe I should send the mugu on a carnival cruise too

TED KOZINSKI

Date: Tue, 26 Jul 2005
To: barristerjohn_natalia@pluno.com
Cc: info@cbcbankcorp.org

Dear Sir,

Alright then, I will compromise with you. I shall call the airline directly and purchase the plane ticket for you. In return you shall lay out the money for the certificate. For undertaking this risk I shall offer you $10,000 of my prize winnings. This is to ensure that this is a legitimate matter. I will not hand over $2,000 in advance to a total stranger. If you do not accept I shall find someone else to manage this affair.
Ted Kozinski

messages.body:
Dear Mr Ted,
 If you can't send 2000US$ to a stranger,I hope you
 can send 1250$ to me for my local, international
 espenses and my consultation fee,while in spain to
 help you get the Certificate.
 
 You have your way ,If you think you can get someone
 else to help you do the claiming go ahead and se if
 it will work,I am an accreditted Lawyer to Elgordo
 Lotteria that is why i can be able to get the
 Certificate and also finalize your winning.
 
 I ve nothing much to say because i am a man of few
 words.
 Fine by me you buying the Airticket.But note if you
 buy it and i couldn't fly with the Ticket Just
 consider the Winning closed and you forget about the
 Money.
 
 The Airticket here is 750US$.You can buy the
 airticket directly from the airline.
 
 But you will have to send 500US$ to me for my local
 and international espenses.
 Then US$750 for my consultation fee.This is making
 US$1250.
 
 So the total amount you will send minus the airtick
 fee is US$1250.
 The Payment Information is below
 First Name:  Ernest
 Last  Name: Adam
 State:          Berlin
 Country:      Germany.
 
 Meanwhile i shall be ready to get confirmation from
 you about the airticket you will be purchasing.
 
 Thanks,
 Barrister.John Natalia.
messages.raw:
BARRISTER JOHN NATALIA

Dear Mr Ted,
If you can't send 2000US$ to a stranger,I hope you can send 1250$ to me for my local, international espenses and my consultation fee,while in spain to help you get the Certificate.

You have your way ,If you think you can get someone else to help you do the claiming go ahead and se if it will work,I am an accreditted Lawyer to Elgordo Lotteria that is why i can be able to get the Certificate and also finalize your winning.

I ve nothing much to say because i am a man of few words. Fine by me you buying the Airticket.But note if you buy it and i couldn't fly with the Ticket Just consider the Winning closed and you forget about the Money.

The Airticket here is 750US$.You can buy the airticket directly from the airline.

But you will have to send 500US$ to me for my local and international espenses. Then US$750 for my consultation fee.This is making US$1250.

So the total amount you will send minus the airtick fee is US$1250.
The Payment Information is below
First Name: Ernest
Last Name: Adam
State: Berlin
Country: Germany.

Meanwhile i shall be ready to get confirmation from you about the airticket you will be purchasing.

Thanks,
Barrister.John Natalia.

messages.body:
Cc: info@cbcbankcorp.org


Dear Sir,

You have failed my little test of trust.  It is
apparent that you do not trust me, but you expect me
to trust you.  Do not take me for a fool, sir.  That 
settles this affair, does it not?  I no longer have
use for your services.  

Ted Kozinski

TED KOZINSKI

Dear Sir,

You have failed my little test of trust. It is apparent that you do not trust me, but you expect me to trust you. Do not take me for a fool, sir. That settles this affair, does it not? I no longer have use for your services.

Ted Kozinski

messages.body:
Cc: barristerjohn_natalia@pluno.com



Dear Sir, 

If I won a prize then send the money to the account I
gave you.  Please spare me the dog and pony show about
certificates and lawyers.  When Ophrah gives a prize
she does not ask for certificates or lawyers to go on
plane trips.  Ophrah simply hand you the keys to your
car and then heads off to Jenny Craig.  If I were a
good-looking rich successful man like Steadman I would
be associating with the likes of Tyra Banks instead,
or Halle Berry if he really poured on the charm.  But
then again Halle got it on with Billy Bob Thornton so
maybe there is hope for me yet.

But I digress. I have no interest in enriching a
flim-flam cattle lawyer.  All of the money being
mentioned here is directed at removing money FROM my
trousers, rather than adding TO them. You can imagine
sir that my interest is waning, not unlike having a
hardon wilting when you are having high quality
intercourse with Fran Drescher until she opens up her
yap and spoils the atmosphere.  YOU sir, are the one
spoiling the atmosphere.  

Sir, your requirements are suspect, if you are not
able to send me my share of the winnings, deducting
any traditional fees, then I am no longer interested.

Ted Kozinski 



Ted may or may not hear back from Los Gordos - there have been quite a lot of arrests of scammers in Spain recently. See "Estafarama" link in news section of main page, or search the web on "Operation Nile" and "Marbella". Olé!

messages.body:
Apparently this Lad was not swept up with ther other 300 or so.




 

   Dear Ted,
I got your mail ,and i couldn't believe that you
will say i do not trust you.I am doing all my
possible best in seeing that you get your winning
,But you do not want to follow my directions.

I trust you ,that is why we said that once you get
your Winning ,that you should send the 2% to us.WE
would have take it from here but as a matter of fact
no money/fee is been deducted from the Original
winning till after the Winner get his winning Money.

So i don't know what to tell you to know that i am
realy serious about this all and to see that we put
this to a succesfull end.
The best i could do now as a result that i can not
deduct the 2000US$ from your winning ,is to give you
my words that you wil get your winning.
If i get this Certificate i will forward it to you
in the original copy.then you after going through it
will send the Original copy to the Bank via Post or
Coureir.

I will fly to Spain with the money i will lend from
a Financier,i will return by Friday,But i must give
this Financier back the money by Monday.

After my writting this mail,I will leave for Spain
tomorrow Morning and will return by Friday.But you
must assure me that once i return by Friday and show
you the scanned copy of the Gaurantee Claim
Certificate ,that you will send the 2000US$ to me
imeediately so that i will settle the debt.If you
know that you will do as i say then you should write
me back as soon as you recieve this mail.

So that i will go ahead and collect this Money from
the Financier and leave for Spain tomorrow.

Thanks and hoping to hear from you.
Barrister.John Natalia

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

So we are in agreement then.  When you show me the
scanned certificate, I will get the prize money and I
shall send you $2,000, you have my word on this.

Ted Kozinski






 
     Dear Sir,
 You ve misunderstood my word.
 
 There is no day that the Bank will accept scanned
 one from you.
 I said i will get the certificate  then show you the
 scanned copy.if you send the 2000US$ i lend from a
 financier then i will send to you by postage the
 Original copy of the Certificate of which you will
 as well send to CBC Bank.
 
 If this is ok by you let me know so that i will give
 you the scanned copy of the certificate by tomorrow
 ,because i am now in spain.
 Thanks.

messages.body:
Dear Sir,

I will scan a photo of $2,000 for you.  This is the
money I shall send you after I receive the certificate
and collect my prize.  You have my word.

Ted Kozinski

[This picture is one of many used by the Lads to impress potential victims. The reader may find it useful to compare with other exciting pictures of money on the Show Me The Money Page. Surely the Lad will recognize this picture as one he may himself have used? Will he be amused?]
